ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Everquest comic books
ygData.msgSnippet: If you can t find a comic book store in your area (and you can look for one at www.yellowpages.com) there are online stores that sell comics. Hopefully you
ygData.messageBody:
If you can't find a comic book store in your area (and you can look for one
at www.yellowpages.com) there are online stores that sell comics. Hopefully
you will be able to find them.
I wish they had mentioned these comics in patch update info or something.
Would've been nice to know they existed.
luv,
-Su


> AH I finally get to see a pipc of the comic! ty that
> looks soooo cool!!! I want I want I want!!! now I have
> to find somewhere in this crappy little cold hellhole
> I am in that actually has them~ good luck to me =o)
>
> Ecko~
>
>

> > luv,
